typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Store_Code as string,
		Store_Name as string,
		CAIS as integer,
		TRANSDATE as integer,
		TRANSTIME as integer,
		TRANSNUM as integer,
		LINE_ID as integer,
		VOID_FLAG as string,
		RCPT_NOTE1 as string,
		RCPT_NOTE2 as string,
		SALE_TYPE as string,
		Brand as string,
		Department as string,
		SubDepartment as string,
		Class as string,
		Short_name as string,
		product_code as string,
		Waist as string,
		Inseam as string,
		NetSold_Qty as string,
		Cost as string,
		Retail_Price as string,
		Unit_Price_Sold as string,
		Discount_ID as string,
		Discount_Code as string,
		Discount_Description as string,
		Line_Applied as string,
		Amount_Discount as string,
		Percent_Discount as string,
		New_Price_After_Discount as string,
		NetSold_Amount as string,
		TAX_RATE as string,
		TAX_AMOUNT1 as string,
		TAX_AMOUNT2 as string,
		staff_code as string,
		Staff_Name as string,
		TS_ID as string,
		PriceOverride as string,
		Surver_Gender as string,
		Surver_Age as string,
		vipcode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	wildcardPaths:['retail_csv/']) ~> RetailSalesDetail
RetailSalesDetail derive(transaction_date = toDate(toString(TRANSDATE),'yyyyMMdd'),
		tax_amt = coalesce(toDecimal(replace(TAX_AMOUNT1,',','')),0) + coalesce(toDecimal(replace(TAX_AMOUNT2,',','')),0),
		net_sold_amt = toDecimal(replace(NetSold_Amount,',',''))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		transaction_date as date,
		transaction_num as integer,
		line_id as integer,
		store_code as string,
		product_code as string,
		staff_code as string,
		net_sold_qty as integer,
		net_sold_amt as decimal(9,2),
		tax_amt as decimal(9,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		transaction_date,
		transaction_num = TRANSNUM,
		line_id = LINE_ID,
		store_code = Store_Code,
		product_code,
		staff_code,
		net_sold_qty = NetSold_Qty,
		net_sold_amt,
		tax_amt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactSales
RetailSalesDetail sink(input(
		store_code as string,
		store_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		store_code = Store_Code,
		store_name = Store_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimStore
RetailSalesDetail sink(input(
		product_code as string,
		brand as string,
		department as string,
		sub_department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		product_code,
		brand = Brand,
		department = Department,
		sub_department = SubDepartment
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimProduct
RetailSalesDetail sink(input(
		staff_code as string,
		staff_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	mapColumn(
		staff_code,
		staff_name = Staff_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimStaff
